quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: You don't have enemies
quotes.author: Thors

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: If you are still explaining your probably losing!
quotes.author: Jordan B Peterson

quotes.text: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: It’s not just about living, it’s about living rightly
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzche

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: If your explaining your probably losing
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzche

quotes.text: I am not built for this type of Downtime
quotes.author: Jordan B Peterson

quotes.text: You want points for cleaning up a mess that you created?
quotes.author: Quoticly

quotes.text: How it feels to be clown of my story?
quotes.author: Isagi Yoichi

quotes.text: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: When your opinion’s wanted, you give it, when you’re spoke to, you speak
quotes.author: Thors

quotes.text: It is better to be hated for what you aren't, than to be loved for what you are not
quotes.author: Andre Gide
